name: Forza Motorsport 5
description:
Forza is a long-running series of racing game that took a standard formula and adds several personal touches. Realistic and bright car designs, energetic soundtrack, and racetracks that will test the driving skill of every player.
Forza 5 was brought to the players with 200 different cars from more than 50 manufacturers and brands, and after the initial release, there were eight monthly car packs. Each of them consisted of 10 cars and could be purchased as DLC. Each car can be individually upgraded and purchased from the main menu.
Soundtrack took a turn from the licensed songs, creating an original orchestral score, mixed with a previously established in the series ambient electronic sounds. More than 2 hours of original music, released and distributed digitally.
Most racing tracks in Forza are a detailed representation of real-life locations or transferred fictional tracks from previous titles of the franchise. One of the tracks is a recreation of a Top Gear test track after the promotional Xbox One reveals by the cast of Top Gear.
